text: Sutaram tomara taderake hatya karani, baram allaha'i taderake hatya karechena. Ara tumi matira musthi niksepa karani, yakhana ta niksepa karechile, baram ta niksepa karechilena allaha sbayam yena imanadaradera prati ehasana karate parena yatharthabhabe. Nihsandehe allaha srabanakari; parijnata.
